translated: In the middle of disputes is not smeared;
Who do you say is a great man,

analyzed: kaḥ idha sip bini macca gā
translated: Who here has gone beyond the chatter?”
“In sensual pleasures, one who is celibate,
A monk who is emancipated through discernment,
For him there is no shaking.
In the middle of disputes is not smeared;
I say he is a great man,
He here has gone beyond the chatter.”
The Questions of Tissa Metteyya is finished.
